Parameters.Name: DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES
Parameters.Description: To verify Device Management Service Capabilities of the DUT

Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features All steps are true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get service capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: No response
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES test when DUT returns no response on the request

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get service capabilities Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Fault
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES test when DUT returns Fault on the request

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get service capabilities Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetServiceCapabilities() in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 1004 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Incorrect response - no Network
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES test when DUT returns Capabilities without Network.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get service capabilities Transmit done Receive done The element 'Capabilities' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl' has invalid child element 'Security' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl'. List of possible elements expected: 'Network' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl'. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES

List of possible elements expected: 'Security' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl'. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Incorrect response - no System

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-6 DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES

Test.Name: Incorrect Capabilities
